localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Draftshot is an app that predicts how popular your shots might be before you upload it on Dribbble. Whether it's a logo, web design or illustration, it doesn't matter. Draftshot uses machine learning to predict popularity of any design.
blogPost.body: Draftshot is an app that predicts how popular your shots might be before you upload it on Dribbble. Whether it's a logo, web design or illustration, it doesn't matter. Draftshot uses machine learning to predict popularity of any design.
blogPost.title: Draftshot for Dribbble - Predict how popular your shot might be on Dribbble
blogPost.author: Vladislav Len

localize.description: Draftshot是一款应用，它可以在你上传到Dribbble之前就预测你的镜头可能会有多受欢迎。无论是logo、网页设计还是插画，都不在话下。Draftshot使用机器学习来预测任何设计的受欢迎程度。
localize.tagline: 预测你的投篮在Dribbble上的受欢迎程度。

localize.description: Draftshot是一款應用，它可以在你上傳到Dribbble之前就預測你的鏡頭可能會有多受歡迎。無論是logo、網頁設計還是插畫，都不在話下。Draftshot使用機器學習來預測任何設計的受歡迎程度。
localize.tagline: 預測你的投籃在Dribbble上的受歡迎程度。

previous.excerpt: Join the Stock Rewards Revolution! Get fractional shares of the brands you love as you shop, automatically. No need to "tap to activate". Simply link as many bank accounts as you like and sit back and earn Stock Rewards.

localize.description: 加入股票奖励革命! 在您购物时自动获得您喜爱的品牌的零碎股份。无需 "点击激活"。只需连接任意数量的银行账户，便可坐享股票奖励。
加入股票獎勵革命! 在您購物時自動獲得您喜愛的品牌的零碎股份。無需 "點擊激活"。只需連接任意數量的銀行賬戶，便可坐享股票獎勵。

next.excerpt: Find the most converting headline on your landing site with Juggler! It is an intuitive and straightforward A/B testing tool for your site and it's fully online. Just add the lightweight script on your site and you are ready to find the best headline!
next.title: Juggler.dev - The easiest way to proceed A/B testing on your site

localize.description: 用Juggler在你的登陆网站上找到最具转化率的标题! 它是一个直观直接的A/B测试工具，为您的网站，它是完全在线的。只需在您的网站上添加轻量级脚本，您就可以找到最好的标题了!
localize.tagline: 在您的网站上进行A/B测试的最简单方法。

localize.description: 用Juggler在你的登陸網站上找到最具轉化率的標題! 它是一個直觀直接的A/B測試工具，爲您的網站，它是完全在線的。只需在您的網站上添加輕量級腳本，您就可以找到最好的標題了!
localize.tagline: 在您的網站上進行A/B測試的最簡單方法。
